channel.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
channel.description: I'm adding a couple features to my server, and one requires a warning of some sort. So instead of gating it off and making users tele through the gate and it send the message. I was wondering if it were possible to have it send a message if you go through the coords one way, but on exit, it not send any message? I don't know how to do either. So, enlighten me please.

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:11, topic:485275”]One thing at a time… You went from warning message to spawning npcs on the same topic.

c.npcHandler is referring to…
NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(this);

So check that for guidance[/quote]
I solved the message thing. And I’ll look into that

Edit…
I’ve looked around. This is how it’s handled in other classes:

Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 4095, c.absX, c.absY, c.heightLevel, 0, 100, 5, 50, 50, false, true);

And I tried adding it in (I messed with some imports) and still getting an error.
This time it’s saying it can’t find spawnNpc. Location npcHandler of type NPCHandler.

Edit: Both problems solved

Read full topic

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

One thing at a time… You went from warning message to spawning npcs on the same topic.

c.npcHandler is referring to…
NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(this);

So check that for guidance

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is what I’ve got:

		c.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 655, c.getX(), c.getY()-1, 0, 0, 200, 45, 60, 50, true, true);

and it’s saying “cannot find symbol”

Which yes, I know what it means.
I imported the handler, I’ve also tried variants of how it’s capitalized, seeing as mine is NPCHandler.java
But nothing. I’ma try a couple more times.

(spawnNpc does exist.)

Read full topic
item.source: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

A temporary boolean or integer is just a variable that is declared only in a method or if statement. For example:

public void exampleMethod() { int number; boolean isTrue; }
And that makes it so the variable is only used when that method is called.

For the npc spawning when clicking an object, you could use something like this:

case ####: Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, NPC_ID, c.getX(), c.getY()-1, -1, 0, HITPOINTS, MAXHIT, ATTACK, DEFENCE, true, true); break;
The:

c.getX() c.getY()-1
Are the coordinates of which the npc is spawning at. In this case, if you were to use what I have provided, it will spawn right next to you. To make it aggressive, go into your NPCHandler class and search for:

And just add the npc id into that. Let me know if you don’t have the spawnNpc method in NPCHandler.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:485275”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=603507.msg4223808#msg4223808 date=1360904652]

Do you want it to be specific X and Y coordinates? Or just along the X axis or Y axis?

It was specific. I did it in a very shitty manor… Lol, I set to things of booleans.
If one was true and the other was false. It sent the message (like I wanted)
if both were true, it didn’t send the message.
[/quote]
You should use temporary booleans if you aren’t already.[/quote]

I don’t even know how…

Hey , do you know how to make clicking an object spawn an npc that force attacks the player?

Read full topic

item.title: Make a message pop up if you walk past Coords?[PI] [/solved]
item.dc:creator: @penguinimp penguinimp
item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

Something like

public boolean warningarea(){
     If (absX > #### && absY > ####
          && absX < #### && absY < ####) {
          return true;
     } else{
          return false;
     }
}

public Boolean InWarningZone;


If (warningarea()) {
      if (!InWarningZone) {
          InWarningZone = true;
          C.sendMessage("warning");
      } else {
          InWarningZone = false;
      }
}

Then have your check be like in the movement section or something.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:2, topic:485275”]Like :
if(absX == 1023 && absY == 1323){
sM(“Warning?”);
}
?[/quote]
Well, it’s PI, so it’d be c.sendMessage. Though that’s not an issue.
Plus, your code would show both ways.

Ehh. I think I could do a boolean to check if player is in pos. and if true, message send doesn’t work, if false message send works.
